definition: to run/to run away/to escape/to run around (on errands etc)/(of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate/(verb complement) away/off
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: Then suddenly they vanished behind a great clump of trees growing in the middle of the Hippodrome .
sentences.chinese: 然後他們突然被跑馬場中間的一大片樹叢遮擋住了。

sentences.english: The horse paced around the ring.
sentences.chinese: 那匹馬在跑馬場的四周溜蹄。

sentences.english: Western Anatolian dancers perform at the Hippodrome.
sentences.chinese: 古羅馬跑馬場裏來自安納托利亞高原西部的舞者。

sentences.english: They arrived on the horse court at two.
sentences.chinese: 兩點鐘時他們抵達跑馬場。

sentences.english: She told him she had won the money on a horse .
sentences.chinese: 她對他說，那筆錢是她在跑馬場買彩票贏來的。

sentences.english: Then we drove to Race court to have lunch.
sentences.chinese: 然後我們開車去了跑馬場喫午飯。

sentences.english: The heavy rain made the course ride soft .
sentences.chinese: 大雨使那個跑馬場變得鬆軟。

definition: Taroko, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 te4 se4 she4 hui4 zhu3 yi4

definition: to bridge/to put up a bridge
Old town district/Gucheng district of Lijiang city 麗江市|丽江市[Li4 jiang1 shi4], Yunnan
Iron Curtain (1945-1991) (in Taiwan, 鐵幕 was used to refer to both the Iron Curtain and the Bamboo Curtain)
see 林陰大道|林阴大道[lin2 yin1 da4 dao4]
